duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer medications and vaccinations to animals.
Assist veterinarians in the examination and treatment of animals.
Monitor animal behavior and vital signs.
Maintain records of treatments and medications administered to animals.
Perform laboratory tests such as urinalysis, blood counts, and parasite exams.
Assist in the preparation of animals for surgery.
Provide nursing care for hospitalized animals.
Educate clients on proper animal care.

education_certification.credential: Associate's Degree in Veterinary Technology (Bachelor's Preferred)
